pages.text: Any potion can be converted into the corresponding potion effect type at the magic synthesis matrix, but the duration will be reduced to one-tenth of the original. Fortunately, we can increase the force of the spell to restore the potion effect to its original strength and duration. Potion effects belong to separate application types, and elemental attributes do not affect potion effects. It should be noted that exceeding the potion level with the force attribute will not bring additional effects.
